        private int findVertexIndexByName(java.lang.String theVertexName)
        Get the index of the vertex by the vertex's name.
        Parameters:
        theVertexName - a string that is the name of a vertex.
        Returns:
        the index of the vertex in the list of vertices. Return -1 if not found.

      • findEdgeIndex

        private int findEdgeIndex(Vertex theStartVertex,
                          Vertex theEndVertex)
        Get the index of the given edge from the list of edges.
        Parameters:
        theStartVertex - the start vertex.
        theEndVertex - the end vertex.
        Returns:
        the index of the edge that connects 2 given vertices if found. Otherwise, return -1.
